duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform automotive inspections and communicate diagnostic findings to non-mechanical individuals
Maintain service area standards of cleanliness and orderliness
Comply with company safety policy and federal/state OSHA safety requirements
Perform tire, oil, alignment, fluid, brake, and miscellaneous automotive services

education_certification.credential: Minimum of 2 years of automotive repair experience, completion of Vocational-Technical School program in a related field, or demonstrated skills via third party certificates/assessment. A.S.E. certification in at least one of A1-A8 is preferred.
